item.title: Notes on Econometrics
item.description: True or False? Matrix Algebra (Arbitrary) Linear Model OLS Estimator Derive \(b\) Efficienty OLS Residual Variance / Unbiased OLS Model Interpretation Elasticity Regression Table Compare Models Linear / Log & Interaction : F-stat OLS / GLS : Robust Standard Error Weird Models R Workout Data Generation OLS Regression Warning: haven’t reviewed yet True or False? PS4.Q2.1 Under heteroskedastiticity and/or autocorrelation of the errors, the OLS estimator is still unbiased.

item.title: Notes on Econometrics: PS5
item.description: Q1 Q2 Q3 Q4 a) b) Q1 Show that \(\hat{β}_{IV} =(X′ZW_N Z′X)^{−1}X′ZW_N Z′y\) minimizes \[Q_N(β) = \Big[ \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N (y_i - x_i' β)z_i\Big]' W_N ​ \Big[ \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N (y_i - x_i' β)z_i\Big]\] ​ \[= \Big[ \frac{1}{N}Z' (y - X β)\Big]' W_N ​ \Big[ \frac{1}{N}Z' (y - X β)\Big]\] \(Q_N(β) = \frac{1}{N^2}\Big[ (y' - β'X')Z W_N (Z'y - Z'X β)\Big]\) ——–\(= \frac{1}{N^2}\Big[ y'ZW_NZ'y - y'ZW_N Z'Xβ - β'X'Z W_N Z'y + β'X' Z W_N Z'yβ \Big]\)
